name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 5: Shooting Collection
overview: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 5: Shooting Collection, is the fifth in a series of six compilation titles for the Game Boy Advance that contains emulated versions of Famicom games. It was released in 2006. This particular volume focuses on the three vertically scrolling shooter games that Hudson Soft released for the Famicom, including: - Star Force - Star Soldier - Hector '87
